<div id="whats_new" class="registered_link"></div>

The following changes have been made to EDB Postgres Failover Manager to create version 3.10:

- Support for physical replication slot feature of Postgres

- Support for NAT addresses

- Introduction of a new command to check the status of a local node

- Replace `trigger_file` with `pg_ctl` utility for standby promotion
